ConnectionProxySyntaxItem.Description: Provide the hostname, an IPv4 address, or an IPv6 address enclosed in "[ ]". Examples: www.cooldomain.com, 192.168.2.3 or [2001:db8:85a3:8d3:1319:8a2e:370:7348]
ConnectionProxySyntaxItem.Label: Host

ConnectionProxySyntaxItem.Description: Fill in https for example. If nothing is filled in, http is used.
ConnectionProxySyntaxItem.Label: Protocol
